<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Get data issuers and credentials meta","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data_issuers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the data issuer"},"slug":{"type":"string","description":"The slug of the data issuer"},"description":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The description of the data issuer"},"credentials":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"slug":{"type":"string","description":"The slug of the credential"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the credential"},"category":{"type":"string","enum":["Activity","Credibility","Developer","Humanity","Identity","Metrics","Achievements","Affiliations","Accounts"],"description":"The category of the credential"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"The description of the credential"},"data_issuer_name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the data issuer"},"data_issuer_slug":{"type":"string","description":"The slug of the data issuer"}}},"description":"The credentials of the data issuer"}}}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"unauthorized request"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
